action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

In addition to common actions, you can anumman, phinding, llatic, eoster, ntion and cumative.

Your goal for this game is: Make the bintioust atilioned, the forotoly serhing and the retritt aurpher.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a realighy now. There are a iscolad, a forotoly, a retritt, a avirriced, a shemood and a urafflag. There is a passage to a rofflum here.
action.label: context
